name: Bacon Potato Salad - Family Legacy
author: roterdirndl
summary: This recipe has been passed down for generations. Enjoy. It's savory!
ingredients: ½ pound bacon, cut into 1/2-inch pieces
directions: Place potatoes into a large pot and cover with salted water; bring to a boil
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until slightly tender, 15 to 20 minutes
Remove skin from potatoes; quarter and slice
Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes
Combine potatoes, bacon, onion, celery, and eggs together in a bowl
Whisk mayonnaise, milk, sour cream, vinegar, celery salt, salt, and black pepper together in a separate bowl
Fold mayonnaise mixture into potato mixture until incorporated
Refrigerate 8 hours or overnight to allow flavors to blend
